price: O you who believe, take your precautions, then march out in groups or march out all together.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ خُذُواْ حِذۡرَكُمۡ فَٱنفِرُواْ ثُبَاتٍ أَوِ ٱنفِرُواْ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
